title: The Lusiad, or, Portugals historicall poem written in the Portingall language by Luis de Camoens ; and now newly put into English by Richard Fanshaw, Esq.
author: Camões, Luís de, 1524?-1580.
notes: "Petronii Arbitri Satyricon: pag. 48" (Latin text with English translation on opposite page, with running title: Furor Petroniensis. Petronius his rapture): p. [7]-[20].
